let context, args; let run = (timerInterval) => { timer= setTimeout(() => { let now = (new Date()).getTime(); let interval = now-startTimeStamp if(interval < timerInterval) { // the timer start time has been resetï¼Œso the interval is less than timerInterval console.log('debounce reset',timerInterval-interval); startTimeStamp = now; run(wait-interval); // reset timer for left time } else { if (!immediate) { fn.apply(context,args); } clearTimeout(timer); timer=null; } }, timerInterval); } return function() { context = this; args = arguments; let now = (new Date()).getTime(); startTimeStamp = now; // set timer start time if(!timer) { console.log('debounce set',wait); if(immediate) { fn.apply(context,args); } run(wait); // last timer alreay executed, set a new timer } }} #èŠ‚æµ è®¾æƒ³æœ‰æ­¤åœºæ™¯ï¼šæœ‰â€˜æœç´¢â€™æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œæ¯ç‚¹å‡»ä¸€æ¬¡éƒ½ä¼šé‡æ–°è¯·æ±‚æ¥å£ï¼Œè·å–å¹¶æ¸²æŸ“é¡µé¢è¡¨æ ¼æœ€æ–°æ•°æ®ï¼Œå‡å¦‚çŸ­æ—¶é—´å†…è¿ç»­ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œä¾ç„¶ä¼šé€ æˆå¾ˆå¤šä¸å¿…è¦çš„è¯·æ±‚è§£å†³æ€è·¯ï¼šåœ¨ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´å†…åªæ‰§è¡Œæœ€åä¸€æ¬¡function 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354// å®šæ—¶å™¨æœŸé—´ï¼Œåªæ‰§è¡Œæœ€åä¸€æ¬¡æ“ä½œvar throttling = (fn, wait) => { let timer; let context, args; let run = () => { timer=setTimeout(()=>{ fn.apply(context,args); clearTimeout(timer); timer=null; },wait); } return function () { context=this; args=arguments; if(!timer){ console.log("throttle, set"); run(); }else{ console.log("throttle, ignore"); } }}// å¢åŠ å‰ç¼˜var throttling = (fn, wait, immediate) => { let timer, timeStamp=0; let context, args; let run = () => { timer=setTimeout(()=>{ if(!immediate){ fn.apply(context,args); } clearTimeout(timer); timer=null; },wait); } return function () { context=this; args=arguments; if(!timer){ console.log("throttle, set"); if(immediate){ fn.apply(context,args); } run(); }else{ console.log("throttle, ignore"); } }}
